title: tuNai tandu endanai aNaittaruL
sahitya:
tuNai tandu endanai aNaittaruL purivAi taNikait-talamEvum subrahmaNyanE


anupallavi

  iNaiyaDi unadaiyE enadu pughaliDamAi eNNi vandiDum enniDam irangi nI


caraNam    vinaiyin koDumaiyAl viLaiyum iDarellAm iniyEnum toDarAmal irundavai maraindiDa
kanivODun uLLam karaiya siridEnum karuNai koLLa vENum parama krpAkaranE
